Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Cup
Description: Cup of a rather simple shape (rounded bottom, lip in continuation of the body wall) made from a coarse clay, which is common, buff-coloured, which has large quantities of organic temper and has been polished. Throwing marks and cutting marks are highly visible on the exterior surface.
